meanings.definition: The act of denying or refusing something.
meanings.sent1: Her denegation of the invitation surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: The denegation of his request left him disappointed.
meanings.sent3: His denegation of eating vegetables was met with laughter.
meanings.sent4: The denegation of responsibility weighed heavily on his conscience.
meanings.sent5: The denegation of help from his friends proved to be a mistake.

meanings.definition: A statement that denies or contradicts something.
meanings.sent1: The denegation in his speech caused confusion among the audience.
meanings.sent2: Her denegation of the rumor put an end to the gossip.
meanings.sent3: The denegation of the obvious fact made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His denegation of reality was like living in a dream.
meanings.sent5: The denegation of his involvement in the prank was unconvincing.

meanings.definition: The act of disowning or disavowing something.
meanings.sent1: The denegation of his own actions was unexpected.
meanings.sent2: Her denegation of the family heirloom caused a rift.
meanings.sent3: His denegation of the embarrassing photo made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The denegation of his past mistakes haunted him.
meanings.sent5: The denegation of his heritage was a decision he later regretted.
